home.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Welcome to Linconym's tutorial! 
 
 This tutorial will guide you through the game's features. 
 
 Click 'Next' to continue.

I'm Rune, the guardian of the Linconym's world. 
 
 Linconym is a word puzzle game where you have to link two words by applying simple rules. 
 
 Let's start with the basics!

First, let me present the game's money: Lincoins. 
 
 You can earn Lincoins by completing puzzles, achievements and quests. 
 
 You can use them to buy customization items and boosters. WIP

Second, let me present the game's hints: Linclues. 
 
 You can earn Linclues by completing puzzles, achievements and quests. 
 
 You can use them to get hints on puzzles. WIP

Choose 'Classic Mode ' to play the game. 
 
 In this mode, you have to link two words by applying simple rules. 
 
 You'll discover them in the tutorial act !

By playing the game, you can earn XPs and level up. Leveling up allows you to earn more Lincoins and Linclues ! 
 
 You can see your progress in your profile.

Use the bottom bar to navigate through the game's features. 
 
 You can access the game, available customization, your profile and the settings.

profile.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Welcome to your profile! 
 
 Here, you can see your progress, your Linclues, your Lincoins and your achievements. Do not forget to consult your achievements to claim your rewards!

settings.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Adjust the game's settings to your preferences. 
 
 You can change the music and sound effects volume, and the keyboard's type.

levels.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Chests are positioned at more complex puzzles and allow you to win 3 Linclues once the puzzle is completed. 
 
 Reminder : Linclues are hints that help you to find the solution of a puzzle.

change_letter.title: Tutorial - Change letter
tutorial_content:
The first rule to link words is to change one and only one letter of the start word to create a new one. 

For instance, to link the words "LINK" and "PINK", you just have to replace the "L" with a "P". Let's try it!

delete_letter.title: Tutorial - Delete letter
tutorial_content:
The second rule to link words is to delete one and only one letter of the start word to create a new one. 

For instance, to link the words "PINK" and "PIN", you just have to delete the "K" of "PINK". Let's try it!

add_letter.title: Tutorial - Add letter
tutorial_content:
The third rule to link words is to add one and only one letter to the start word to create a new one. 

For instance, to link the words "PIN" and "PAIN", you just have to add an "A". Let's try it!

practice.title: Tutorial - Practice
tutorial_content:
You can apply only one of these three rules at each step. Let's practice them on a more complex puzzle: "PAIN" to "BRAIN"! Here, you have to find an intermediate word by applying a rule to "PAIN". With another rule on this new word, you'll get "BRAIN". 
Click "Close" to try yourself, or "Next" to see the solution.

From "PAIN", you can create the intermediate word "RAIN", by applying the first rule of changing a single letter. With the word "RAIN", you can create the target word "BRAIN" by adding the letter "B".

reorganize_letters.title: Tutorial - Reorganize letters
tutorial_content:
At each step of the chain of words, you can apply only one of the three former rules. 

Nevertheless, you are also allowed to reorganize all letters, i.e. change their order, while applying one of these rules.
For instance, to link the words "BRAIN" and "BRING", you have to apply the first rule by changing the letter "A" to "G", and reorganize the letters to create "BRING".

all_rules.title: Tutorial - Game rules
tutorial_content: Let me remind you the main rules of Linconym!

The first rule to link words is to change one and only one letter of the start word to create a new one. 

For instance, to link the words "LINK" and "PINK", you just have to replace the "L" with a "P".

The second rule to link words is to delete one and only one letter of the start word to create a new one. 

For instance, to link the words "PINK" and "PIN", you just have to delete the "K" of "PINK".

The third rule to link words is to add one and only one letter to the start word to create a new one. 

For instance, to link the words "PIN" and "PAIN", you just have to add an "A".

At each step of the chain of words, you can apply only one of the three former rules. 

Nevertheless, you are also allowed to reorganize all letters, i.e. change their order, while applying one of these rules.
For instance, to link the words "BRAIN" and "BRING", you have to apply the first rule by changing the letter "A" to "G", and reorganize the letters to create "BRING".
This is all for the rules of Linconym, have a nice game!

themes.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Welcome to the themes customization page! 
 
 Here, you can choose the theme you want to play with. 
 
 You can preview the theme by clicking on the preview button before buying it.

Themes have rareties: common, rare, epic and secret. 
 
 The higher the rarity, the more expensive the theme. 
 
 You can buy them with Lincoins. 

 For each complete theme, you need to buy both the background and the colors of the game.

You can also customize the theme by choosing the background the colors of the game. 
 
 Once bought, you can apply the theme by selecting them. 
 
 Enjoy the game!

boosters.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Welcome to the boosters tutorial! 
 
 Boosters are items that help you to solve puzzles and purchase customization items. 
 
 You can buy them with Lincoins in Customization.

You can obtain Lincoins and Linclues by watching ads. 
 
 Everyday, you can watch up to 3 ads to earn 80 Lincoins or 40 Lincoins and 1 Linclue or 2 Linclues.

A weekly ad is also available to earn 480 Lincoins and 12 Linclues ! 

 You can also convert your Lincoins to Linclues if needed !

musics.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Welcome to the musics customization page ! 

 Here, you can choose the music you want to listen to while playing Linconym. 

 You can listen to the music by clicking on the play button before buying it.

achievements.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Welcome to the achievements page! 
 
 Here, you can see the achievements you have completed and the ones you have to complete. 
 
 You can claim your rewards by clicking on the claim button.

quests.title: Tutorial - Linconym
tutorial_content:
Welcome to the quests page! 
 
 Here, you can see the quests you have to complete. 
 
 Completing quests allows you to earn XPs, hence leveling up and earning rewards.
